ValidationRule.description: HR Liaison permission to F1-Status Status Type field's values
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISPICKVAL(Form1_Status_Type__c,"Request to Hire Submitted") || ISPICKVAL(Form1_Status_Type__c,"Job Offered to Candidate") || ISPICKVAL(Form1_Status_Type__c,"Candidate Accepts") || ISPICKVAL(Form1_Status_Type__c,"Candidate Declined – Salary") || ISPICKVAL(Form1_Status_Type__c,"Candidate Declined – Other Offer") || ISPICKVAL(Form1_Status_Type__c,"Candidate Declined - Other") ) && $Profile.Name = 'HR Division User'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Status Type is not available to your profile.
